name: wifi-commander
title: Wifi Commander
description: Complete wifi management - toggle wifi and scan networks using nmcli
author: dagimg-dot

commands.name: toggle-wifi-on
commands.title: Turn Wifi On
commands.subtitle: Enable Wi-Fi radio
commands.description: Turn on Wi-Fi radio to enable wireless connections

commands.name: toggle-wifi-off
commands.title: Turn Wifi Off
commands.subtitle: Disable Wi-Fi radio
commands.description: Turn off Wi-Fi radio to disable wireless connections

commands.name: restart-wifi
commands.title: Restart Wifi
commands.subtitle: Restart Wi-Fi services
commands.description: Restart Wi-Fi services to resolve connection issues

commands.name: scan-wifi
commands.title: Scan Wifi Networks
commands.subtitle: List available wifi networks
commands.description: Scan and display all available wifi networks with signal strength and security info

commands.name: manage-saved-networks
commands.title: Manage Saved Networks
commands.subtitle: View and manage saved Wi-Fi connections
commands.description: List all saved Wi-Fi networks, connect to them, or forget them
